overview: From light bulbs to catering for business trips.. “I will do anything.” Young-cheol, who started a new concept service business with the motto of 'Young-cheol, was called around and worked hard.  Yeong-cheol's girlfriend Mi-yeong is curious about how Yeong-cheol is doing these days, so I'm listening to various stories of Yeong-cheol's work. ..  Strangely, the guests who want Yeong-cheol are all women, and not just a housekeeper who cooks and cleans.  It 's just women who want everything from Yeong-  cheol. How long does Yeong-cheol have to do this kind of service?
title: Bright housekeeper
